trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer forekomster av <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> til og fra andre typer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Expression> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Expression>typen bør ikke bruke en type konverteringsprogram bane til å konvertere verdier (bør bruke markup utvidelser i stedet).</xref:System.Windows.Expression>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> always return `false`.
<xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> always throw an exception.
## XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ExpressionConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.ExpressionConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert from a source object to an <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere fra kildeobjekt til en <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere fra.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns whether this converter can convert an <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object to a specific destination type.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere en <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> -objekt til en bestemt måltypen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Converts the provided value to the <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer den angitte verdien til den <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> type.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The object to convert.
Always throws an exception and returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Alltid oppstår det et unntak, og returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the provided <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> objektet til den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The object to convert.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Always throws an exception and returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Alltid oppstår det et unntak, og returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
